Title: Death of a Salesman
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Kate Reid, John Malkovich, Stephen Lang
Plot: Salesman Willy Loman is in a crisis. He's about to lose his job, he can't pay his bills, and his sons Biff and Happy don't respect him and can't seem to live up to their potential. He wonders what went wrong and how he can make things up to his family.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.
